author: mhwalker
body:
Retuned LowPtTripletStep highPurity MVA cut to remove the step in the chi2 distribution - it pretty much disappears.

Retuned TobTecStep highPurity MVA cut to recover some efficiency at high dxy. Most efficiency lost for dxy < 50 cm recovered.

![effvspos](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4852006/8566655/a6705b5e-252d-11e5-81e8-bc804a451671.png)
![tuning](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4852006/8566654/a66fde90-252d-11e5-82df-5183d1566e00.png)
title: tuning MVA cuts for lowPt and tobTec
